backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Report describing a feature update improving the Celebration page’s autoplay‑blocked audio prompt.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing human‑written summaries of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and global styles defining light/dark color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component switching between proposal, celebration, and future‑family pages.
frontend/src/components/GlassOverlay.tsx: Glassmorphism container component wrapping children with blur and rounded styles.
Exports the long celebration message string shown on the Celebration page.
frontend/src/content/uploadedMedia.ts: Lists image asset paths and exports the celebration audio file path.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoplayAudio.ts: Manages autoplay audio logic, detecting policy blocks vs real load/play errors and exposing retry controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, clear, and identity‑loading behavior.
Controls timed image‑sequence progression and signals when the slideshow completes.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles, color variables, fonts, and custom animations used across the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App bootstrap creating React root and wrapping the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CelebrationPage.tsx: Runs an image slideshow with audio autoplay handling, then transitions to a grid display with overlays and a continue action.
frontend/src/pages/FutureFamilyPage.tsx: Shows a generated family image with a caption and footer linking to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Displays a proposal prompt with a stationary Yes button and a No button that moves randomly or transforms based on user interaction.
frontend/src/utils/positioning.ts: Provides functions to get random on‑screen positions and detect overlap between rectangles with padding.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, plugins, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for the Valentine website flow.
